description: This file declares functions, structures, and constants for handling X.509 certificate attributes, supporting creation, cloning, setting, adding, getting, and encoding certificate-related attributes used in PKI (Public Key Infrastructure).

methods.name: PKICertAttributeFree
methods.description: Deallocates resources associated with a certificate attribute object.

methods.name: PKICertAttributeClone
methods.description: Creates a copy of a given certificate attribute object.

methods.name: PKICertAttributeSetKeylengthInByte
methods.description: Sets the key length property in bytes for the certificate attribute.

methods.name: PKICertAttributeAddCountryName
methods.description: Adds a country name attribute to the certificate.

methods.name: PKICertAttributeAddOrganizationName
methods.description: Adds an organization name attribute to the certificate.

methods.name: PKICertAttributeAddOrganUnitName
methods.description: Adds an organizational unit name attribute.

methods.name: PKICertAttributeAddStateOrProvinceName
methods.description: Adds a state or province name attribute.

methods.name: PKICertAttributeAddGenerationQualifierName
methods.description: Adds a generation qualifier name attribute.

methods.name: PKICertAttributeAddPKCS9Email
methods.description: Adds an email address attribute for PKCS#9.

methods.name: PKICertAttributeTrace
methods.description: Outputs trace information of the certificate attribute.

methods.name: PKIParsingAltName
methods.description: Parses an alternate name string into internal representation.

methods.name: PKIAltNameGetTotalBlock
methods.description: Returns the total number of blocks in the alternate name.

methods.name: PKIAltNameGetBlockType
methods.description: Retrieves the type of a specific block in the alternate name.

methods.name: PKIAltNameGetBlockValue
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a specific block in the alternate name.

methods.name: PKIAltNameFree
methods.description: Frees resources associated with an alternate name object.
